mapper.insert: insert into assos(MENO, MNO, ASSO, A_PHOT, HINT, DATE, BEST, LIKES, HATES, FAVOR, A_THUM) values((select MENO from MEANS where mean=#{mean} and word=#{word}), #{mno}, #{asso}, #{assophotPath}, #{hint}, now(), 'N', 0, 0, 'N', #{assothumPath});

update.if: update assos set MENO=(select MENO from MEANS where mean=#{mean} and word=#{word}), ASSO=#{asso}, HINT=#{hint}, DATE=now() where ANO=#{ano};
update assos set MENO=(select MENO from MEANS where mean=#{mean} and word=#{word}), ASSO=#{asso}, A_PHOT=#{assophotPath}, HINT=#{hint}, DATE=now(), A_THUM=#{assothumPath} where ANO=#{ano};
